mapper.sql: no, orderNo, customerNo, goodsId, deliveryTime, specifications, quantity, groupNo, priceNo, unitPrice, sumAmount, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId, handleFlg
mapper.insert: insert into t_cons_order_details (no, orderNo, customerNo, goodsId, deliveryTime, specifications, quantity, groupNo, priceNo, unitPrice, sumAmount, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId, handleFlg ) values (#{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into t_cons_order_details
no,
orderNo,
customerNo,
goodsId,
deliveryTime,
specifications,
quantity,
groupNo,
priceNo,
unitPrice,
sumAmount,
addTimestamp,
addUserKey,
updTimestamp,
updUserKey,
updPgmId,
handleFlg,
#{no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update t_cons_order_details
orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliveryTime = #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sumAmount = #{sumamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handleFlg = #{handleflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_cons_order_details set orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliveryTime = #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sumAmount = #{sumamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handleFlg = #{handleflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.groupNo as groupId, a.goodsId, b.goodsName, b.goodsThumbnail as goodsImage, a.quantity as goodsQuantity, a.unitPrice as goodsPrice, a.specifications as goodsPropertiesDB, a.handleFlg as detailStatus, c.inStockFlg as isStock from t_cons_order_details a inner join t_goods b on a.goodsId = b.goodsId inner join t_goods_group c on a.groupNo = c.groupNo where a.orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select A.no as detailOrderNo, D.goodsName as goodName, A.quantity as goodQuantity, A.unitPrice as goodUnitPrice, A.sumAmount as detailAmount, A.orderNo as orderNo, (DATE_FORMAT(B.orderTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d %T')) as orderTime, (B.orderAmount + B.deliveryCost) as allAmount, A.handleFlg as detailStatus, B.handleFlg as orderStatus, (DATE_FORMAT(A.updTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d %T')) as completeTime, B.commentsCustomer as orderComment, B.commentsAdmin as orderCommentAdmin, C.telNo as customerPhone from t_cons_order_details A inner join t_cons_order B on A.orderNo = B.orderNo inner join t_customer_security_info C on B.customerNo = C.customerNo inner join t_goods D on D.goodsId = A.goodsId inner join t_customer_basic_info E on E.customerNo = B.customerNo where 1=1
and E.nickName like concat('%',#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and (DATE_FORMAT(B.orderTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d')) >= #{dataFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (DATE_FORMAT(B.orderTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d')) <= #{dataTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and C.telNo like concat('%',#{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and (A.handleFlg = '1' or A.handleFlg = '2')
and (A.handleFlg = '3')
order by orderNo desc,orderTime desc

select count(1) from t_cons_order_details A inner join t_cons_order B on A.orderNo = B.orderNo inner join t_customer_security_info C on B.customerNo = C.customerNo inner join t_customer_basic_info E on E.customerNo = B.customerNo where 1=1
and E.nickName like concat('%',#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and (DATE_FORMAT(B.orderTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d')) >= #{dataFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (DATE_FORMAT(B.orderTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d')) <= #{dataTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and C.telNo like concat('%',#{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and (A.handleFlg = '1' or A.handleFlg = '2')
and (A.handleFlg = '3')
select sum(a.sumAmount) from t_cons_order_details a inner join t_goods_group b on a.groupNo = b.groupNo where a.customerNo = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.inStockFlg = '1'
